history.proof: intros p q H. sauto q: on depth: 3.

exceptions.exn: Expects a disjunctive pattern with 2 branches.

original: intros p q H. destruct H as [H1 H2]. unfold distinct_parity in *. destruct H1 as [Hodd Houn]. destruct H2 as [Heven Hodd2]. split. - split. + apply Hodd. + apply Heven. - split. + apply Hodd2. + apply Houn.
